Implements the analogs of the unary arithmetic operators for complex numbers.
@1@ Returns the value of its argument
@2@ Negates the argument

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | val | the complex number argument}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1@ a copy of the argument, {{c|std::complex&lt;T&gt;(val)}}
@2@ negated argument, {{c|std::complex&lt;T&gt;(-val.real(), -val.imag())}}
